text: aur aap jahaan se bhee nikalen, apana mukh masjide haî€¼raam kee or pheren aur (he musalamaanon!) tum jahaan bhee raho, apane mukhon ko usee kee or phero; taaki unhen tumhaare virudhd kisee vivaad ka avasar na mile, magar un logon ke atirikt, jo atyaachaar karen. atah unase na daro. mujhee se daro aur taaki main tumapar apana puraskaar (dharm vidhaan) poora kar doon aur taaki tum seedhee dagar pao
